title: Physics-Inspired Modeling and Content Adaptive Routing in an Infrared Gas Leak Detection Network
summary: Detecting infrared gas leaks is critical for environmental monitoring and industrial safety, yet remains difficult because plumes are faint, small, semitransparent, and have weak, diffuse boundaries. We present physics-edge hybrid gas dynamic routing network (PEG-DRNet).
